oai_dc:dc.dc:title: African American baseball team
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Embracing Citizenship
Military Service
African American baseball players; Negro leagues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The African American baseball team at Fort Oglethorpe.
Fort Oglethorpe had separate baseball teams for white and black soldiers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Chattanooga Public Library, Powell Collection Fort Oglethorpe Photographs
